about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust library for indexing and searching text within documents. It supports over 70 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, images, and ZIP files, ensuring fast and precise search results.

more_features.title: Explore {{EnvNameShort}} document search engine
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows phrase searches across 70+ file formats. Easily find and organize data using advanced search features.

feature_1.title: Phrase search
feature_1.content: Locate exact phrases in business documents, such as PDFs, Word files, presentations, and spreadsheets. Use wildcards and other options when the exact phrase is unknown.

feature_2.title: Optimized data indexing
feature_2.content: Speed up document searches by creating and reusing search indexes. Indexing organizes data efficiently for faster and more accurate searches.

feature_3.title: Multi-language compatibility
feature_3.content: Search documents in over 80 languages. Supports different keyboard layouts and morphological analysis to improve search precision.

feature_4.title: Advanced search options
feature_4.content: Customize searches with case sensitivity, fuzzy search, homophone matching, document filtering, and other powerful features.

formats.title: Search phrases in business documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} enables phrase searches in 70+ document formats. Leverage advanced options and indexing for efficient searches.
